WorkItem.Description:
I get the following error:
 
The project file 'C:\..\Oxite\OxiteSite\OxiteSite.csproj' cannot be opened.
The project type is not supported by this installation.
 
How do I get to open the OxiteSite Project?
WorkItem.Summary: OxiteSite Project in solution not loading (VWD Express)

Comments.Message: Try opening the VWD Express solution (<root>/Oxite/Oxite.VWDExpress.sln). More info/discussion -> [workitem:6741]
Actually, I believe dotnethelp's issue is that they need to install ASP.NET MVC, which is included in the getting started documentation already.

Yeah, I guess that's why "the project type is not supported" :)

In that case this page would be more useful -> http://www.codeplex.com/oxite/Wiki/View.aspx?title=gettingstarted&referringTitle=Home

If you're interested in cracking open the db project -> http://neimke.spaces.live.com/blog/cns!F964EB605E70A5CA!513.entry
